name: corticalai
description: CorticalAI combines everything you need to build powerful AI assistants

scripts.start-chroma: docker run -d --name chromadb -p 8000:8000 chromadb/chroma:latest || docker start chromadb
scripts.reset-chroma: npm run stop-chroma && npm run remove-chroma
scripts.dev: sudo npm run reset-chroma && concurrently "sudo docker run -d --name chromadb -p 8000:8000 chromadb/chroma:latest || sudo docker start chromadb" "cd examples/duckduck-go && NODE_ENV=development node index.js" "cd frontend && sudo npm run dev"

author: Roger Amos
